title: The Wither
description:
The Wither is a similar creature to the Wither Skeleton.

This creature must be summoned through
a ritual by placing four Soul Stone blocks
in a T-shape and then three Wither Skeleton Skulls on top of these blocks.

You will need to defeat the Wither Boss
to obtain the Nether Star, which is needed
to activate a robot found in the Ancient Factory.
